code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"./App.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){console.log("App component is rendering...");const[prompt,setPrompt]=useState("");const[response,setResponse]=useState("");const sendPrompt=async()=>{const res=await fetch("http://localhost:8000/chat",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({prompt})});const data=await res.json();setResponse(data.response);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"BP\u2019s Dev \u2014 Tech Bro Guru"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:prompt,placeholder:"Ask away \u2014 I need a new headache \uD83D\uDCA5",onChange:e=>setPrompt(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:sendPrompt,children:"Send"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"response",children:response})]});}export default App;
